attributes.additional_details: Central government to create a sustainable, resource based, money free town along the lines of the “Venus Project”, in each of its nine regions, large enough to house the homeless people and suitable vulnerable people, of each region, such as orphans coming of age and young people coming out of care homes etc. These hybrid towns will be high tech, have enough housing pods for the area’s vulnerable, and paid support workers. The community will be self-sufficient, generating excess power, growing excess food, with small manufacturing units /machines including 3 d printers to create a small excess to trade for cash, which can then be shared equally by the individuals in the town so they may interact with the outside world.
